showScoreExcerpt:
" Suffice it to say that director Scott Ellis has adeptly created a production that moves along much faster than a baseball game with sharp crack-of-the-bat scene changes. The set by David Rockwell is minimal and highly functional in the way it flows from scene to scene. There are stand-out tip-top performances, even in the smaller roles, by the whole ensemble cast (highlighting: Jesse Williams, Michael Oberholtzer, and Jesse Tyler Ferguson). Iâ€™ll say it again, a well-deserved standing ovation."
